TopicTitle: Looking for a Stock Part Re-Texture

Articles.Content:
Well, basically I've been looking around for a Re-Texture pack that makes all the Stock parts look more coherent with each other, as currently some of the stock parts seem to clash visually, with varying visual styles and coloring between parts. I just want all the parts to look like they were all made to visual match with each other, if anyone knows of a re-texture pack that does this please let me know.
